item.title: ~~~Troll-Scape Reborn~~~LOOKING FOR A TEAM!(positions all filled)
item.dc:creator: @Kid_Maul Kid Maul
item.description:
@Kid_Maul wrote:

Michael it’s me Kid Maul I was one of the first ones on your server to be specific I was the 3rd or 4th player to log on, I don’t know if you remember me we have only spoken a couple of times, but I worked my way up from Moderator to Admin, your brother was the one who usually promoted me his names Mark? If I remember correctly, sorry it’s just I haven’t spoken to either of you in a while i’m not begging for moderator when the server comes back or anything but let me know when it comes online I miss Troll-Scape and please keep it to 317.

Read full topic
